details.excerpt: Blair, a Physics graduate, started his career calling the numbers in Rank Bingo clubs!After 7 years managing large leisure outlets he moved within the Rank Group to head up the market research function including site research. Blair then enjoyed 6 years building models and inventing data products at the boutique consultancy GeoBusiness Solution. Following the acquisition of GeoBusiness by MapInfo Blair became the principal architect for the EMEA predictive analytics unit, ran the analytical services department and was finally, a principal global product manager looking for all analytical and routing data.
details.description:
Blair, a Physics graduate, started his career calling the numbers in Rank Bingo clubs!After 7 years managing large leisure outlets he moved within the Rank Group to head up the market research function including site research. Blair then enjoyed 6 years building models and inventing data products at the boutique consultancy GeoBusiness Solution. Following the acquisition of GeoBusiness by MapInfo Blair became the principal architect for the EMEA predictive analytics unit, ran the analytical services department and was finally, a principal global product manager looking for all analytical and routing data.

GeoLytix was founded by Blair Freebairn in 2011.
